versions.title: Profile Cards & Theme System
versions.description: Full profile card system, theme marketplace, and XP tracking overhaul.

groups.title: Profile Cards
items: Card shows level, global rank, XP bar, rep, stats, bio, badges

groups.title: Theme System
items: 14 themes across Standard, Premium, Seasonal & Exclusive tiers
Themes cost Tokens — buy & equip from the marketplace website
Each theme has a unique color scheme; 7 have custom pixel-art backgrounds
Exclusive themes (Legend Gold, Founders) are earned, not purchased

groups.title: XP Overhaul
items: XP now tracks server messages + group commands combined
Chat Activity stat shows server messages only
Global XP shows total combined activity
Level-up rank checks use total activity

groups.title: Website
items: Marketplace — new Profile Themes tab with category filters
Marketplace — new Profile Settings tab (set bio, more coming)
Bio/About set from website, no longer a bot command

versions.title: Economy Overhaul
versions.description: A sweeping overhaul of core economy and gambling systems — fixing broken mechanics, adding real risk/reward, and introducing pets, job levels, and more.

groups.title: Gambling Fixes
items: Slots — weighted rarity, fixed pair detection
Coinflip — pick heads or tails before flipping
Blackjack — 3:2 natural BJ, upfront bet, double down
Spin — legendary tier now reachable (~1%), rarity label

groups.title: Mines & Ladders
items: Mines — multiplierBoost applied, bonuses on cashout
Ladders — left/right choice now affects success odds
Rob — 70% success chance, catch penalty added

groups.title: New Systems
items: Pet system — adopt, train, battle, release
Job levels — 10 tiers with XP and multiplier bonuses

groups.title: Quality of Life
items: Leaderboard — total wealth (wallet + bank), rebirth tag

versions.title: Automation & Web Marketplace
versions.description: Introduction of the Web-based Marketplace and the new Autofishing system.

groups.title: Web Marketplace
items: Buy access items online (e.g. Autofish Access)

groups.title: Autofishing
items: Bot automatically fishes for you while active

versions.title: Fishing Overhaul
versions.description: Major fishing system overhaul — mythical tier fish, random cast events, streak bonuses, bait consumables, and a fully reworked stat display.

groups.title: New Fish & Tiers
items: 4 new rare fish (Void Eel, Abyssal Angler...)

groups.title: Cast Events
items: Double catch — reel in two at once
Treasure — find bonus coins on the line
Lucky cast — rare chance doubled that throw

groups.title: Streak & Bait
items: Streak system — up to 3x value at 100 casts
All 55 rods now have rare-chance scaling

versions.title: Dice Duel PvP Gambling
versions.description: Player-vs-player dice gambling. Challenge others to high-stakes dice rolls to test your luck.

versions.title: Romance & Economy Expansion
versions.description: Major romance system expansion with new gambling games and enhanced fishing economy impacts.

versions.title: Advanced Upgrade System
versions.description: Seven unique upgrades enhancing every aspect of gameplay progression and efficiency.
